Posted By: Rick McQuillan
Hi, I am selling a T205 card of J. Owen Wilson.  This card is graded a 2.5 by GAI.

PayPal with no extra fees, check, money order - all are fine.  Price includes shipping.  Will consider a trade for raw T205 or T206.

$30 shipped.  rickmcquillan@gmail.com


Thanks much!

Rick
